query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usDataSyncStatus` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `dataType` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `source` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `lastSyncAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `status` ENUM('success', 'partial', 'failed') NOT NULL,
  `recordCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` TEXT,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `us_dataType_idx` (`dataType`),
  INDEX `us_lastSyncAt_idx` (`lastSyncAt`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3tyUrnEAZmgrWaW.7957998e07fb --database KzRzifpe7R9Hr8c3sVfR6n --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usDataSyncStatus` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `dataType` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `source` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `lastSyncAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `status` ENUM('success', 'partial', 'failed') NOT NULL,
  `recordCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` TEXT,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `us_dataType_idx` (`dataType`),
  INDEX `us_lastSyncAt_idx` (`lastSyncAt`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
